nodes.text: Maelrich Alde was a female Human and a member of the Alderaanian House Alde during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

A noble woman of the Alderaanian House Alde, Maelrich Alde resided on Alderaan during the Cold War, and her nephew Alethios served as a captain at Wardpost Landa. An opponent to House Rist, Alde sought to disable the Rists' satellite relays in the Juran Mountains and end their ability to monitor communications in the region.
